casebody.data:
No. 10-995. Pennsylvania Prison Society, Petitioner v. Pedro A. Cortes, Secretary of the Commonwealth of Pennsylvania, et al. 563 U.S. 904, 131 S. Ct. 1808,

179 L. Ed. 2d 655,

2011 U.S. LEXIS 2448. March 28, 2011.

Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Third Circuit denied.

Same case below, 622 F.3d 215.
